website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, quick-drying cream that evens up color and texture for flawless eye makeup application.
pros: Goes on with a velvety texture and dries sheer, making it good for older skin
Makes eyeshadows look more pigmented and has a brightening effect
cons: Doesn't work as well with oily skin, especially in humid conditions

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this stuff so badly
customer_reviews.text: No, I will not be Thanking You Later. I wanted to like this stuff so badly. I’m tired of paying big bucks for my usual brand...but at least that works! Thank Me Later primer didn’t do a dang thing for my pores or my makeup here in Houston. It goes on feeling oily, and soon there was a blottable sheen going on through my makeup. Worse, in the heat it just slides right on away into oblivion and took my makeup with it! It was actually faster than using no primer. BUMMER. Back to pricey (but effective) primer...
customer_reviews.author: seaborne

customer_reviews.title: Greaseball
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing negative reviews so I'll try to be nice. This primer didn't work for me. I have oily skin and I live in the south... Yea. This did not keep my foundation in place at all, in fact it broke down within a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: jodyjo

customer_reviews.title: Great primer for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this primer! It makes my makeup go on so smooth and a little amount goes a very long way! Its great if you are prone to oily skin. However, I would NOT GET IT IF YOU HAVE DRY SKIN. I don’t have issues with dry skin but just from the consistency of this primer, I would bet t wouldn’t set good if you have dry flakey skin (it will probably make it look horrible if you put makeup on top of it). But for my skin type (oily), It’s one of the best primers I’ve bought on Amazon so far and will be forever in my makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Of Cats

customer_reviews.title: Best primer EVER!
customer_reviews.text: So let me start by saying I have used nearly every eyeshadow primer available. From high end to low. Mac, Lorac, Urban Decay... they don't hold a candle to Thank Me Later. I have very oily skin. Using this primer, shadow lasts a full 8 hours or more. I could get maybe 5 or 6 out of the other brands, if I'm lucky. I got this as a sample in my ipsy bag, and I had to buy the full size product straight away! I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Thank you Elizabeth Mott for finally making a primer that lasts! I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mae

customer_reviews.title: The best primer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying that i have a very oily T-Zone. I have tried numerous primers from every price range and I can say that I finally found the one primer that controls the oil in that area. I start to see shine with other primers within a couple of hours but with this one it last up until the 5th or 6th hour of my work day. My face is not completely matte at hour 5 or 6 but my makeup isn’t sliding off my face either. I would recommend this to anyone with extremely oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: anizel

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Do a patch test before using this full-on
customer_reviews.text: Severe allergic reaction warning! On the day I used it all around my eyelid it rendered great results. Next day skin around my eyes started itching and 36 hours later my eyes were completely swollen and puffed up! Then skin started cracking and took more than two weeks to fully recover. The damage extended beyond the area the product was applied. Sadly I threw out the box immediately so could not ask for a refund/return. I tried NARS eye primer after this and that was much better.
customer_reviews.author: WHH

customer_reviews.title: Held up in Humidity!
customer_reviews.text: I ran 1.5 miles in 85 degree Georgia weather (HUMID) and my shadow did not budge one bit, it held up just fine as the rest of my face was drenched! I'm a believer! Picture is right after I finished my run.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great at doing it's job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer. It's silicone based, but unlike some silicone based primers, it doesn't give you that "greasy" feel. With this, my Estee Lauder double wear foundation wears a good 10 hours. I usually just have to powder once, which is amazing to me.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it .... But no ...
customer_reviews.text: i did not like this primer. I have oily skin and it just did not work for me. It's nice once it's on , but it's a bit oily. It did not hold my makeup throughout the day , and my biggest issue was that my makeup did not stand out with it on. It's almost like not wearing a primer .... My skin absorbed most of my makeup. I tried it a few times now and I honestly hate it. Maybe it works for other people , but now me ... If you have oily skin please don't waste your money this does not make your makeup last at all. Drug store brands did more justice than this
customer_reviews.author: Elenaa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality eyeshadow primer
customer_reviews.text: I have exclusively used Urban Decan Primer Potion for the entirety of my twenties. This stuff works just as well and is WAY cheaper. I posted a pic of a very mediocre eyeshadow look, but the look isn’t what’s important. What’s important is that this matte eyeshadow did. not. crease. I even had lunch outside in the Alabama humidity. I am so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It cakes up!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a Roc primer that they discontinued. This had such good reviews that I decided to try it. It cakes up badly. I even tried rubbing it between 2 fingers before applying. I tossed it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great product, make up lasts all day.
customer_reviews.text: This primer is by far the best I've tried. I have oily eyelids but love to do cat eye make up which can be a struggle to pull off without looking like a racoon within a few hours. The product goes on smooth and my makeup lasts all day with minimal smudges if any at all! Best of all its cruelty free!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: They are okay but this is hands down the best. Dries quickly and isn't "goopy"
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of the expensive brands for eyeshadow primer including Too Faced and Tarte. They are okay but this is hands down the best. Dries quickly and isn't "goopy". Eyeshadow is easy to put on and doesn't get clumpy. I have what I would consider to be oily eyelids (gross, right?) Below is a pic 12+ hours after application which includes a grocery trip, Christmas shopping, house cleaning and a hockey game. Still intact and no creases. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Transparent. Not smooth. Dulled the shadow color. Creased somewhat
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t go on smooth. Left chunks on application. Zero coverage from it FYI. I know many create at least a bone toned base for contrast. Used w urban decay shadow. Felt the color looked more dull than usual. Minor creasing toward the corner after about 5 hours. Am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Small tube, Drying and Burns
customer_reviews.text: This tube was much smaller than expected (urban decay sells bigger tubes and probably equals out in cost) and very drying. After 3 applications roughly every other day my eyelids started to burn when using it and show signs of a scaly dermatitis. For the size and cost this is a major disappointment. Will go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Moceanpictures

customer_reviews.title: Don’t cover the pores.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t like the product . It just arrived . I read the reviews and I decided to buy and have my own opinion. Unfortunately, it doesn’t work at all. A waste of money. I gonna returned it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderful Amazon

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! An inexpensive 5 star face primer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying that I absolutely love Sephora products, and really like Make Up Forever base primer and have used it for the last couple years. Not wanting to spend $40 on it, I was wary but decided to try a cosmetic item on amazon. The reviews are what convinced me and I had to write one to express how much I LOVE THIS PRIMER! It’s oil mattifying but makes your skin feel silky smooth. I don’t even want to put foundation on! This stuff makes my skin look and feel great. And for the price-absolutely a great deal! I would hands down buy this again and again and say goodbye to my pricey brand name primer.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Products NEVER break me out, but this did
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER break out from products. I have extremely oily, acne prone skin, but I’m lucky that my skin isn’t sensitive and products never break me out. I’m 21 years old and I’ve been wearing makeup since I was 15, and this is the first time a product has broken me out. EVERYWHERE. It burned, inched, and I got bumps everywhere. It also felt really greasy and gross on my skin. I’ve read the reviews and there are many people who had similar experiences, though many people also liked it. Overall, I would say look somewhere else! Not worth the risk!
customer_reviews.author: tara tedjarati

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my 40's and busy all day. I have no time to fix my makeup during the day. I've using the bb cream and thought it was working as a primer, but still at the end of the day, i noticed my makeup looked like it had run down, melted away. Since I started using this primer, my makeup stays until the end of the day, even after I sweated quite a bit. This product deserves its name. I wish they make bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Particular

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, can't figure out what I'm doing wrong...
customer_reviews.text: With all the positive reviews, I had high hopes...and the first couple applications seemed to work well for me. However, every subsequent use after that didn't. I started noticing a lot of caking, and it was accentuating creases instead of helping to prevent them. Since it worked the first couple times, I did try different application methods, including using much less than I probably needed, to try and replicate what I did before, but couldn't get it to work for me again. I did give it 4 starts for the first couple uses as it worked as intended, just not sure what I'm doing wrong now to not get those same results.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Best I can find so far
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this once and loved how it completely blurred my pores and made my makeup look flawless, but being new to primers I thought it should keep me matte all day, which it definitely does not. So I returned it, tried a million other primers, none of which kept me from getting oily as the day progressed, would break me out, and didn't make my makeup look as good as this one did. So I determined this is the best I'm going to find and repurchased .
customer_reviews.author: TPBMM

customer_reviews.title: Creased before i could put my eye shadow on. No good.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan. Creased before I could even get any eye shadow on. Had an oily texture. I returned it for a refund. Will stick with MAC products for an eye shadow base. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: SSTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This stuff Seals the Deal! Feels like Silky Smooth! 💓
customer_reviews.text: Like I said, this stuff Seals the Deal! By that I mean, after you do all your skin care then put this on and THEN start putting on your foundation and concealer and powder etc. it will give you the most smooth surface not only to work with but it will also show! You’ll have a flawlessly silky smooth face!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brett

customer_reviews.title: I AM AMAZED
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING URBAN DECAY PRIMER FOR MY EYES FOR ABOUT FIVE YEARS BECAUSE MY EYELIDS HAVE GOTTEN OILY SINCE THEN . I AM 82 YEARS OLD AND STILL USE MAKEUP AND EYELINER. THE EYELINER ON MY LEFT EYELID DID NOT PREVENT THE LIQUID LINER FROM SMEARING BADLY SO I SENT FOR THIS PRODUCT HOPING THAT IT WOULD WORK. WELL, IT DID. I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THIS. THANK ME LATER IS A WINNER.
customer_reviews.author: lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive alternative to sephora!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of spending way too much money on brand name makeup, so I turned to amazon for some dupes. This primer right here is by far one of the best primers I have ever used. I'll probably be using it for years to come because the price is right, and they even send a mini sample eye primer in the box with the full size face primer, which are both amazing btw. My makeup stays on all day at work, with no creases or greasiness. It glides on easy, and I've actually gotten a few compliments on how good my skin has been looking lately.
customer_reviews.author: Catey

customer_reviews.title: *shrugs* WHATEVER...
customer_reviews.text: All these reviews saying how great this is...it's no better than any other primer I've used. If you've got oily skin, expect to start shining in about 3 hours. I'll finish up what I have but wouldn't reorder. I prefer Loreal Studio Secrets No. 1 Magic Perfecting Base as an affordable and useful option.
customer_reviews.author: T. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me less oily but not completely matte
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the eyelid primer but this face primer doesn’t do it for me. When I first found out about the eyelid primer and used it it was amazing and it held up my eyeshadow for hours especially through exercise. I can’t say the same about the thank you later primer though I still get oily. However I have to give it three stars because it does delay the oiliness a little bit. As opposed to my Loreal primer I would say it does a better job however it doesn’t completely keep me matte. I really wanted to enjoy this primer maybe it’ll work for other people but unfortunately for myself I will have to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: ruby nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Farewell Fine Lines
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this stuff and and am almost out. I immediately went online to buy it! This is the best primer I’ve tried. It beautifully fills in fine lines, mattifies, and blurs. I decided to show the effects on my wrist because I think it more clearly shows a blurring effect, as if I’d used a photo editor to reduce the appearance of fine lines. And I don’t think the photo even does it justice! I highly recommend this product. Even for days where you want something quick, you can wear this on its own and it will smooth your skin beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Day old eyeshadow never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: I’m not necessarily a huge makeup buff but spend more time on my eyes than anything else. Historically I’ve just used foundation as a base coat but this stuff is a game changer. You literally could wear the same eye makeup for a weekend and it would stay in place. No creasing or smearing whatsoever. The only complaint I have is that It holds so well that I have a hard time blending or smoothing out shading. I’m not sure if that’s typical since I’ve not used a true eye primer previously. It can actually be just a little more difficult to wash off but I use a baby wipe to get any residual makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: MoMasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice and will again.
customer_reviews.text: I wear my eyeliner from a narrow liquid line to a wide extended cat eye. I was having a problem with smudging from tears and eyelid oil. I read many reviews for several products and tried a couple but Thank Me Later won out over all the others. You only need a tiny amount and has a slight creamy pearlescent color. It makes eyeshadow application smoother and better blended as well as keeping the color and shape for the whole day. The tube is small but it lasted at least 8 months of daily use. I liked it so much bought I bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: MaryO

customer_reviews.title: As excited as I was to try this
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, it's funny I used it this morning under my eyeshadow and forgot about it. It was a busy day at work and I got home, walked my dog and started doing other things. Fast forward to 12:30 am when I went to take off my makeup and looked in the mirror and said goodness my eyeshadow is not only still there but vibrant. I'm impressed. It definitely deserves the great reviews and I'm happy to say I'm pleased as well. I used a little, and it feels sheer so easy to apply and eyeshadow adheres well.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best primer I have used for oily skin that isnt an absurd amount of money. Make up goes on seamless and looks great. I still get a little oily around the T zone after 4 to 6 hours but nothing a little blotting paper doesnt fix.
customer_reviews.author: CYA

customer_reviews.title: A surprising value
customer_reviews.text: It goes on nice and saves on using too much foundation as it allows the foundation to glide over with a nice matt professional finish. Its have the price of another really good brand I like so I will use this for daily and as a back up for the more expensive product I use. In fact I may start to use this exclusively. The twist on cap is not as nice and the better stuff but its not a significant functional deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best primer ever!!
customer_reviews.text: first primer i’ve ever bought and will be sticking with this. i applied this before my prom makeup at 4pm and it lasted me until midnight when i finally got home!!!! it lasted from the hot weather to the dance floor and am super impressed with this product. the makeup stayed on no matter what and i was shocked when i checked myself in the bathroom getting food after the dance to see it was all still in perfect place (the poor lighting doesn’t let you see most of it in the second photo) it went on super smooth and made makeup even easier for me to apply especially foundation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: I use black liquid eyeliner every day and make the thinnest line across my upper lash line. For some reason, my newest tube of Kat Von D eyeliner was causing major racoon eyes so I purchased this product to stop it. The racoon eyes are diminished only by 25% by end of day. What makes this stuff really annoying (besides not preventing a thin layer of eyeliner from running) is the stuff migrates to my lower lash line along with the eyeliner. So removing the black smudges throughout the day is difficult. This product was a complete waste of money. I'm off to find success with another more expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cho

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WHAT YOU'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR! Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Clinique pore minimizer that used to be out there. The formulation was changed snt the new clinique product fails on delivering results. THIS item is amazing. It gives a great matte finish without a chalky look. I was happy to also receive a small tube of eye shadow primer in the package, which I also love using. Do not hesitate. Buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Eh? Am I the only one?
customer_reviews.text: I sort of expected my eye makeup not to move and to look super fresh hours later according to all the positive reviews but it pretty much looks how it always does at the end of the day. My eyelids are not prone to be oily and I work in an office so it’s not like I am asking a lot of the product. It does make my eye makeup go on smooth but it does that with any primer really. Idk, I wanted to love it but it’s just eh. I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: bethany2601

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I used Urban Decay before, but this is a great replacement. Helps the makeup stay put for most of the day. I noticed my eyeliner will sometimes smudge at the end of the day, but Arizona summers will do that. Glad I came across this one. I plan to stick with it. Has no color at all and goes on easy. No wand, just squeeze, so I don't feel like I'm going to be leaving half of it in the tube when it starts to run out. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerianne L

customer_reviews.title: This is my new foundation.. Great primer!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in a beauty box and loved it. Was thrilled to find this on Amazon for $15! I don't wear foundation much, I usually just throw on some BB cream or tinted moisturizer. I put some of this on after my moisturizer, use a little Becca hydra mist powder to set and I'm good to go. My friends can't believe I don't have foundation on when I do this. Bonus is that it reminds me of strawberry whipped icing.
customer_reviews.author: Luxie33

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using " Thank Me Later " face primer for the last few years. It feels wonderful on your skin, very silky without any sticky or heavy feeling. It has a nice matte finish and leaves your face looking smooth and ready for your makeup. I am 72 yrs old and this product helps reduce fine lines and not so fine lines so I couldn't ask for any more than that!!
customer_reviews.author: MissySippi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FACE PRIMER
customer_reviews.text: This works soooo well! Looking at the other reviews I was getting cautious, seeing that people were saying it’s horrible for oily skin/pills on face/causes them to break out, just no. These people either have allergies to this makeup, or they did not wait for it to dry on their skin before applying other makeup. I have SUPER sensitive skin and this stuff has done me no wrong. This primer also goes a long way with a little drop so it lasts a while!! Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Magical Elixir to keep eye makeup on!!
customer_reviews.text: This stiff is GOLD!!!! I Bought it because my eye & brow make up kept disappearing into my skin by absorption & sweat (I teach water aerobics). This stuff is so awesome I finish class with my “eyes” on!!! Even better, it saves me TIME b/c I don’t have to reapply my make up before going to the next job. I was CONSTANTLY reapplying brows and eyeliner ALL DAY I also use it to plump up and fill tiny wrinkles around my lips (SHHH! Don’t tell!) as it fills them in quite nicely. A little tiny pinhead drop is all you need for each area so it goes far. Never going back to naked skin under my make up again!!’
customer_reviews.author: Jax..... citizen of the world

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gamble buying this primer since I had NEVER heard of it, I just accidentally stumbled across it on amazon. However I took my chances and it is AMAZING. I have very oily and sensitive skin so my makeup never lasts and I always break out. This primer is sooo silky smooth to apply and you only need a little bit. My makeup stays now and I don’t break out! Just buy it girl!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea torres

customer_reviews.title: Eye shadow didn't melt off No smell that I could detect Wasn't patchy Easy to apply with your fingers
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my eye shadow where its supposed to be. Pros: Eye shadow didn't melt off No smell that I could detect Wasn't patchy Easy to apply with your fingers, or a small makeup brush if your doing under your eyes as well I was sent a trial bottle of the eye primer as well, even though I use this for my eyes. But whatever, free product. Cons: Honestly, I usually only keep makeup on for a few hours a day, before removing it either for bed, or for a more "evening look", so I cant really say if this makes the shadow last longer for periods longer than six or so hours.
customer_reviews.author: T Patistas

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever go without this?!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This stuff is great! Ive never worn a primer but my wedding was coming up and so I thought I would give anything a try. I've always had trouble since I started wearing makeup with my shadow creasing in my eyelids, even worse since my eyes are sunken in a tad bit more. Im a nurse on a busy unit and my eyeshadow now stays as perfect as when I put in on at the beginning of the 12 hours! AND i made it through my whole wedding and reception even with all of the sweating without my eyeshadow creasing. Im amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Best matte primer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This makeup primer has made all the difference in the world for not only full makeup but when it work and wearing a mask eye makeup it will last me forever.on both occasions that I've used it so far I've had people at work exclaiming how good my eye makeup looks whether it be full shadow or just eyeliner It lasts all day with no smearing or contact smudge. I shadow doesn't crease at the lid. Perfect product will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Angela Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Made my foundation patchy, makeup looked better with moisturizer only
customer_reviews.text: This primer made my makeup application worse. Creates visible white spots inside of my pores and foundation doesn't want to adhere to it either, causing foundation to slide around on the face and become patchy. I did a test using this on half my face before foundation application and half with moisturizer only. The foundation on the half of my face with moisturizer only looked more blended and even than the primer side. I thought maybe the core ingredients of my foundation and this primer didn't play well together but they're both silicone based so I'm not sure why this happened. Really bummed out, wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.author: SSRM

customer_reviews.title: my lids got oilier using this product
customer_reviews.text: it literally says it would prevent oil, but it in turned produced more oil on my eyelids and i have very oily lids to begin without. Super disappointed in this product and i ended up throwing it away because i was past the return date and i would never want to give such a terrible product to anyone i know
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised when I blindly took a chance on something new.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer. I've tried several different high end primers that have come in my ipsy bag and some are better than others. The one I loved the most was $40 a tube and that just stung a little. I like the thickness of this compared to some other primers that are more of a liquid in a tube. It's light and has good coverage. I also like that it's just slightly tinted so there's no struggle to select a color to match the skin tone or the powder you're putting over it. I'll replace it with another of the same!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Carty

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adore this primer!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Lord I love this primer. I don't have crazy enlarged pores but they're just big and open enough I need a good pore filling primer to be comfortable with my look. This primer does just that. It also helps with my overly blemished blotchy red skin as I suffer from eczema and rosacea on my face. I really love what this primer does for my skin as well as how it in itself feels. No grease and no shine. If you can't tell I'm a really big fan and definitely suggest giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: This was nothing special. Didn’t make my eyeshadow last more so than any other primer. Pretty expensive for what it is and the packaging felt extremely cheap. No issues with it but I expected something groundbreaking for the rave reviews it had. I haven’t even used it in months, prefer my normal (and cheaper primer). I’ll probably eventually use it just to use it up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Primer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than Urban Decay and Smashbox eye primers. I have very oily eyelids by the end of the day. I literally thanked this eye primer later!! My eye makeup stayed put for over 12 hours. I did not get the massive raccoon eyes I usually get with the other primers. I ABSOLUTELY recommend this eye primer! Where have you been all my life?!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I bought the mattifying face primer. I got it as a sample in my ipsy bag and loved it so I was going to buy it on ipsy but it was $20 so I went to see if it was any cheaper on Amazon and it was $15 and came in just 2 days. Its really good for oily skin and very velvety feeling. It does blur pores and works really well for me as a base for just powder foundation. I have extremely oily skin (within 2 hours my face is shiny and awful after makeup) but this stuff made my makeup last hours longer before getting shiny. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fortheloveofvintage

customer_reviews.title: I dont hate it, but I dont think it's anything to ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont hate it, but I dont think it's anything to write home about. My make up felt like it looked cakier than usual, and it made my nose a little dry. Ill finish the tube, but would not but it again. Everyone is different!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a face primer. In the past I have received a few samples from top brands for primers but those eventually ran out and I wanted to get some more. I can say that stuff works WAY BETTER than the other samples I had. I do not believe it is moisturizing, but it definitely evens out your face before you put on your foundation. I also use this primer before eye shadow as well and it works great. I hardly use any, just a little squirt and apply it directly on my face with my fingers after I moisturize. I wait a couple minutes and then apply my foundation. For the price, it is completely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Zwiefelhofer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Got this because of the "paraben free cruelty free" title. Nah! Should have done more research on the ingredients in the product before ordering, but i didn't. I am a toxic free/chemical free makeup user and this one did not meet the standard. Sorry! Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews! They are all for eyelids and not face!
customer_reviews.text: Super misleading. I thought all of the awesome reviews were for the face primer. I haven’t thought that highly of it (was really bummed bc I thought with so many reviews and so highly rated I would love it). I came back to read the reviews and realized almost all of them are for the eyelid primer? Apparently the eyelid primer and this primer are in the same spot and the reviews are all mixers together. Shame on you Amazon. I specifically searched for a highly rated FACE primer and I clicked on this one and quickly purchased jsut trustinf the star rating. I don’t think it’s fair to lump products and reviews together. I was duped. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my eye makeup in place for hours
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye makeup primer I've ever used. I've struggled for years to find a primer that doesn't crease and keeps my makeup on my eyelid, and my eye shadow color vibrant. This primer kept my eye makeup in tact for HOURS. Last week, I used it before going out. My friends had planned a surprise party for me and this primer kept my makeup on through the happy surprise tears! I love it and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby123

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly, but this is not to help with any wrinkles you have. I mistakenly ran some primer over a couple small wrinkles under my eyes and it immediately made them three times as noticeable as they are completely uncovered. This has a nice smell and it works well with my makeup. I’m having to move toward a tinted moisturizer instead of full coverage foundation for a couple reasons, and I’m hoping this helps keep it in place longer. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlei

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a years long quest to find a primer that actually does what it claims. I recently Googled best pore minimizing primer and this popped up. I read the reviews and decided to try it. I am absolutely amazed by how well it works. My foundation is lasting longer than it has with any other primer I’ve tried. It doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin and has zero fragrance whatsoever. The very best part is that my gargantuan pores look less than half their size. Please don’t ever stop making this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So, I don't wear much makeup. I'm a bb cream, mascara and lip balm kind of girl. But I'm pushing 30, really fair skin, and starting to develop a little line between my brows so someone recommended using HA, a good moisturizer and a primer. My skin looks perfect when I apply this primer and my skin is so smooth! I have dry skin, and this primer isn't very moisturizing but I use a moisturizer anyways. I will definitely continue to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany King

customer_reviews.title: Urban Decays Dupe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tube of this. It is a really epic eye primer. It does not budge.. It holds onto shadow for days if you want. I had a thing for Urban Decays primer but I just couldn't justify $20 for that little tube. This "Thank Me Later" primer performs just as well for much less. My wallet.."Thank you thank you thank you!!" Just let the primer dry a bit before putting the shadow on or else you'll have to wash your good brushes right after because it'll dry on the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My face gets greasy quickly, and the eye makeup basically slides right off. I used to have raccoon eyes every day at work, and it was getting to the point of embarrassing. I tried a couple other products and wasn’t impressed. Thank me later is a light, smooth cream, and you only need a tiny bit. It keeps my eye makeup where I put it. I use some powder to keep it dry, and the results are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Duck

customer_reviews.title: Best. Primer. Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used LOTS of primer because of oily skin on eyelids and it sets eyeshadow well. But THIS product is miraculous. I won't ever use another. Just a tiny dab and my makeup looks fresh all day. Before it would set in creases after several hours and look drab. Now, it looks fresh literally all day until I wash it off late at night. This is super high quality and I am so happy because the price is really good. I think it is better than any brand I have tried before. You won't be sorry with this primer!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Controls oil pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I have super oily and greasy skin, I usually use Becca Evermatte primer but it’s so expensive! I was freaked out at first because it feels a bit greasy when it goes on but it actually does a pretty great job of controlling oil and shine, I will be buying this from now on rather than the Becca brand. I do feel like I need to use more of it than Becca though...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Thank You...Next
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for several weeks, knowing that it really wasn't making any difference, but for the price, I just assumed that it should have been so I kept trying... wondering if I had been doing something wrong The makeup I applied over the "primer" slid into every crack and crevice on my somewhat older face, which is no picnic when you're looking into a 10 x magnifying mirror. I decided to try another primer and that's when I learned that for me, this primer was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Distracted Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a safer alternative to a higher end eye primer I was using. I also wanted to spend less money on makeup. This is about half the price as my old primer, and works almost just as well. It’s slightly less quality, but the less toxins and good price point makes it well worth it. Not a bad eye primer! I have bought a second tube and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 5 or 6 different (expensive) primers to compare them all and see which one is truly the best. This one definitely stood out beyond the rest. It leaves your face feeling smooth/soft with a matte look. Blurs small wrinkles and gives your skin a nice even appearance. I love that it's dry immediately after applying. This one and one other came out to be my favorites (both same price). So I swap back and forth between the two. I would definitely recommend this! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This stuff is amazing. My eye shadow stayed on all day and all night. I hated to take it off because it looked like I'd just put it on. I was an Urban Decay fan, but now, this is my go-to eyelid primer. It's light, removal was much easier than Urban Decay too. There were no creases and it didn't leave that caked feeling that some primers do. This is definitely a product I will buy again. A little really does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Trena

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews very skeptical but purchased anyways since I've tried over 10 primers in the last few months and they all seem the same. This primer is totally different!! It goes on very matte, you can see the shine going away. It also makes every pore look way smaller and lasts all day. I've never had another primer come even close to working this well. It doesn't have a scent that I've noticed and moisturizes as well (not as well as a moisturizer of course but still helps).
customer_reviews.author: Melshebs

customer_reviews.title: IT'S THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other primers & thought Benefit's The POREfessional was the best, until I tried this. I'm an ipsy member so I'm able to try all kinds of high end products before buying them....which is really helpful. I am SO glad that I got this in my bag & was able to try it. I've got huge pores & problem skin & this minimizes my pores & imperfections,plus evens out my skin. Thank you for making a product that actually works the way it says it will :)
customer_reviews.author: 1CatLover

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product several times. I love it. I use to use a more expensive “name brand “ but it became unavailable in my area. I decided to try this based on reviews. So glad I did. 😊 I think it is the best primer I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just use the eye primer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made me breakout SO bad. Like, whoah. And I'm 39, so that really shouldn't be a thing anymore. However, their eye primer is THE BEST I've ever used. High end, low end, I would buy their eye primer all day long. Their all over face primer, no thanks, I'll pass. I don't want to break out like that again. But, my friend wanted to try it so I gave it to her, she loves it. So, there's that I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Darian Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Softest primer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a ton of primers and this one makes my skin feel so smooth. With the matte finish I never feel oily (which is a common issue with my skin) and my make-up stays in-place. I will say that using a setting powder (I’ve tried a few different kinds) doesn’t sit the greatest on top of it, but I have just adjusted my make-up routine to account for that. A little goes a long way with this stuff. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Glowing and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face primer. I originally discovered it through a sample I received and fell in love. I am very sensitive to chemicals and touch, most primers I try are way to heavy on my skin. This primer is very light and it feels good when I put it on. It also makes my face look bright and glowing, I have tried other "illuminating" primer but they always seem to make my face look like it has glitter on it. This primer does not do the while still giving off that perfect illuminating effect. 100% recommend this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Face Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin so it's very hard for me to find primer that can fight back my oily face. I recommend this product because this actually does the trick for most of my day. This of course this is NOT a luxury beauty product like Tatcha primer but it's a good second and cheaper option. Also using better quality ingredient makeup over top of this primer is a helpful factor to how well the primer will work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Matte Primer - Best primer EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Although this is supposed to be for oily skin, it isn’t drying at all! I have 63 year old dry skin that is prone to rashes. I use powder foundation. This goes on like velvet - no drying time. My makeup now looks the same at the end of the day as it did when I put it on. My wrinkles are so much less noticeable! I discovered this when I got a sample in my Ipsy bag, or I would have never tried it. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and not especially "illuminating"
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, but I don't like the sticky feeling of it on my skin. Even after adding foundation, my face felt sticky. The product was a bit iridescent out of the tube, but not on my skin. I have been trying to avoid face powder because of wrinkles, but the finishing spray did nothing to reduce the stickiness of this primer. I have filed it under "no other choice" use because it was cheap and a little went a long way. I will go back to the silicone primer that has a clean finish and is not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Annazon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing: No Effect on Oil
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Estee Lauder's Mattifier primer and wanted to give this a try since it's half the price and was curious to see if it worked better because of the great reviews. While it felt very smooth on application, much smoother than my usual primer, it didn't really seem to do much to curb the production of oil and I found myself blotting and powdering much more throughout the day. I must admit that it was so disappointing I didn't bother giving it a second chance and threw it away the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 50's and have had oily skin all my life. Now my eyelids are even more oily than ever because of my age. I wear makeup nearly every day for about 14 to 15 hours. Prior to using 'Thank Me Later' eye primer, my eye shadow would be greasy looking with a lots of unsightly creasing by lunch time. Since I have started using 'Thank Me Later', my eye shadow is still looking dry and intact when I'm getting ready for bed! It is an amazing product and one I won't be with out in my make up routine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bremerman

customer_reviews.title: Hope this helps....
customer_reviews.text: Do not put this on ur zits as it's hard afterwards to cover zits with concealer. I don't see what the hype is all bout yet but 1st time applying I ran into this problem already. If primer is put on a zit then it doesn't soak up the concealer which is why u put it on is to cover it. I notice this primer has a soft overall feel and not recommended if u have allot of acne. Reason I say this is cause I started my period had a breakout then recieved this In mail and it doesn't do wonders or covers completely, way less then more actually.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: I use this primer daily under my makeup before I go to work. The makeup stays, but my t-zone is super shiny by about hour 5-6. I have been using it for the past couple of months and while I think it may work for staying power, it doesn't help much with shine control, which is something that's important to me. For customers that don't have an issue with shine or oil control, it would probably be much better suited.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer. Its rich and creamy with a nice soft feel. It goes on so smoothly and is a perfect base before liquid or powder makeup. It helps smooth out the skin and pores so my foundation looks better and stays set longer. The smell is not overwhelming or flowery, its subtle. I love that the tube doesnt allow for big gobs to come out. Instead it's a small pea size (just right) so you're not wasting it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Best primer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tube of foundation primer I have purchased. It goes on smooth with a nice matte finish, foundation stays on all day. I really do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I frequently am underwhelmed by cosmetics I purchase online, but not in this case. This creates a flawless base for your foundation. It fills in the pores, fine lines, etc. I am thrilled with it. Also, a little bit goes a very long way.
customer_reviews.author: Writeway

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. As an older woman (59 years old) keep what small amount of eyeshadow & liner I still use in place has been problematic & this product performed far above my expectations. After a very long day in hot temperatures & even a bit of sweating, my eye makeup stayed where I put it with no creasing, caking, smears or smudging. There was no eye irritation at all which I have had with all other eye primers/moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A Gray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for oily lids!
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing smokey eyes all day long but by the end of the day I would look a hot mess. I have super oily skin and this primer has lasted all day avoiding all crusty creases and racoon eyes. Elizabeth Mott's primer is incredible in that it feels smooth and hydrating yet make-up stays on perfectly the same. It is a bit pricey for the size of the tube but it is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ArlyQ

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank you now. This is a great primer. I have mature skin, but I have heat intolerance. My makeup usually lasts 15 minutes without smudging. I didn’t expect it to work so I am thrilled that it did. I love this primer. Great price, great feel, lasts all day. What could be better???
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: Uneducated Makeup woman finds solution to oily eyelids
customer_reviews.text: my uneducated makeup background has solved the answer to my melty eyeshadow problem with this product. I couldn’t for the life of me figure out why my black eyeliner kept looking sparkly like my eyeshadow. Turns out my eyelids are naturally oily. This stuff keeps your eyelids fresh all day long (and in my case well into showering that night and scrubbing it off even after makeup remover). The only legit complaint I have is it’s such a small little tube to pay for the full price.
customer_reviews.author: lala_Ichabod

customer_reviews.title: Nice effect
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear foundation as my skin tone is more pink rather than foundation shades. This is perfect to use after my serum/moisturizer sinks in. It is a good soft focus/eliminate shine coverage. You can use this on your eyelids as a primer, too. Every type of makeup you would want to use over top of this should just glide on with smoothness. My soft focus/eliminate shine lasts to whenever I wash my face. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this product and it really does help my makeup last longer throughout the day, even while sweating! Overall, it's a good product and I'll more than likely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay CW

customer_reviews.title: All-day protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It gets humid this time of year, and after a day of teaching middle schoolers, my eye make-up used to get smudgy, no matter what i tried. I would end the day looking like I did three rounds with a boxer. This stuff is magic!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Bates

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to like this product. After reading so many positive reviews, and learning that it is cruelty free, I was really excited to try it. However, I find that it does not do a good job of keeping my shadow from creasing throughout the day and colors seem to lose their vibrancy. Sometimes the shadow even creases almost immediately after application, and it can leave my eyelids feeling tacky for quite a while. For the price tag it just isn't worth it, and I will be switching back to the Ruby Kisses 24 HR Eyeshadow Magic Primer which worked a lot better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H.

customer_reviews.title: Oil control
customer_reviews.text: Best primer I've found after a very long search. I've spent upwards of $80 on one primer hoping to find that Holy Grail, only to be sorely disappointed. I know that "one size fits all" is not the best approach with makeup so with that being said, this primer works for me and my troubled skin. Most primers I've tried don't help with oily skin that is worse midday but this primer controls it. My makeup isn't splotchy or broken up midday either. I recommend trying this primer. The price is affordable and the company promises to stand by their products so if it doesn't work for you, no biggie! Just return it and keep on searching.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I dont necessarily have oily skin, but I work outside all day, so I do sweat. This product keeps my face shine gree, soft and keeps my makeup looking fresh the whole day! (Provided I dont rub my face) i had a sample size in my ipsy bag almost a year ago and there is still some left. I do not use it every day and i do use other primers, but this product lasts a long time and a little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Huckaba

customer_reviews.title: Good Primer-Works as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This product was good overall. It went on easily and the color was fine. I have fair skin but of course I have no idea what it would be like on darker skin. Since it's what I consider a 'base' for eye shadow, I only apply it once a day. Once my makeup is on, that's it! No time to redo it. My eyelids are a bit oily, but it didn't come through the primer. I think what I do need though is something that will cover the red in my lid. I didn't really want to go that way but maybe I'll buy some and just dab it on those spots under "Thank Me Later!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cavallo

customer_reviews.title: The Holy Grail of eye primers
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this eye primer, and it is the best primer I've ever tried. I have pretty much tried all eye primers, from high end stupid priced, to drugstore. This primer is the best of them all. It is like glue. Nothing is moving until I take it off at the end of the day. There is no reason for me to use any other eye primer ever again. This is The One.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Not for mature skin, mine anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I am 45 years old and hoped that this would smooth out my eyelids some. Nope, just added about 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Tourangeau

customer_reviews.title: your makeup will stay put!
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy about this purchase. I wanted to wait for at least a month after I started using to really put it’s staying power to test. I work over 12 hours and I’ve used this product to keep eyeshadow and eyebrow makeup in place (YES, MY EYEBROW MAKEUP REALLY!) and it has not disappointed. A little bit goes a long long way and I reckon this tiny tube will last me a good 7-8 months. It’s the perfect budget-friendly alternative to the leading eyeshadow primer. It’s a great buy! I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marivi Monver

customer_reviews.title: Elizabeth Mott Thank Me Later eyeshadow primer
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST eyeshadow primer I have EVER used!!! I have a line on my eyelid & this primer doesn't let it show. My eyeshadow looks flawless & lasts longer than 24 hours!! This has replaced all other eye shadow primers for me. I won't use ANYTHING else!! You only need a tiny bit. It is also half the price of my former go to eyeshadow primer. It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DollFace

product_meta.title: Eye Primer Makeup Eyeshadow Base: Elizabeth Mott Thank Me Later Eye Shadow Base to Prevent Oily Lids and Creasing - Clear Waterproof Eyeshadow Primer for All Shadows - Paraben Free & Cruelty Free, 10g
feature_bullets: LONG LASTING: Our long wear eye base locks in and enhances your shadow color for a flawless look
QUICK DRYING: The transparent eyeshadow base dries in seconds for a smooth, crease free application
BRIGHTENS AND BALANCES: The pearl powder evens and brightens your skin tone while combating oiliness
WEIGHTLESS FEEL: A lightweight, non-greasy eye primer perfect for oily skin and eliminating creases

NO ANIMAL TESTING: Elizabeth Mott is a cruelty free brand in PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If for any reason you aren’t satisfied, contact us for your money back, no questions asked.
